Text.Page:
Interference from these local creatures is affecting our research efforts. How am I supposed to get anything done while {@LinkCreature:26#2004#mossy teraliths} and {@LinkCreature:26#4000#patient lithikumases} prowl around?

The federation will reward you if you keep us safe and kill a few. Report to Naerie when you have.
You have our thanks, my friend.
There can be no compensation without proof of action. Have you proof these creatures are slain?
